version.description: Semantic version for the metadata JSON format.

name.description: Identifies the asset to which this token represents.

decimals.description: The number of decimal places that the token amount should display.

description.description: Describes the asset to which this token represents.

image.description: A URI pointing to a resource with mime type image/* representing the asset to which this token represents. Consider making any images at a width between 320 and 1080 pixels and aspect ratio between 1.91:1 and 0.7:1 inclusive.

properties.description: Arbitrary properties. Values may be strings, numbers, object or arrays.

uri.description: The URI pattern to fetch localized data from. This URI should contain the substring `{locale}` which will be replaced with the appropriate locale value before sending the request.

default.description: The locale of the default data within the base JSON

locales.description: The list of locales for which data is available. These locales should conform to those defined in the Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (http://cldr.unicode.org/).
